com.cboe.interfaces.domain.product
Interface PriceAdjustmentHome

public interface PriceAdjustmentHome

A home to create and find price adjustments.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String HOME_NAME
          Name that will be used for this home.
 
Method Summary
 PriceAdjustment create(PriceAdjustmentStruct newAdjustment)
          Creates a new price adjustment.

          Deletes the given price adjustment.

          Finds all price adjustments.

          Finds price adjustment affecting product related to class.
 PriceAdjustment findByKey(int adjustmentKey)
          Finds a price adjustment given its key.
 PriceAdjustment findByProduct(Product adjustedProduct)
          Finds a price adjustment given its product.

Constant Field Values
Method Detail

create

PriceAdjustment create(PriceAdjustmentStruct newAdjustment)
                       throws AlreadyExistsException,
                              DataValidationException
Creates a new price adjustment.

Parameters:
newAdjustment - CORBA struct containing price adjustment values.
Returns:
new price adjustment
Throws:
AlreadyExistsException - if price adjustment already exists for product
DataValidationException - if validation checks fail

delete

void delete(PriceAdjustment adjustment)
Deletes the given price adjustment. Delete will cascade to reporting class and product entries for the adjustment.

Parameters:
adjustment - adjustment to be deleted.

findAll

PriceAdjustment[] findAll()
Finds all price adjustments.

Returns:
found adjustments

findByClass

PriceAdjustment findByClass(ProductClass adjustedClass)
                            throws NotFoundException
Finds price adjustment affecting product related to class. The related product is either the underlying product of the class or the first active product of the class.

Parameters:
adjustedClass - product class being adjusted
Returns:
price adjustment of related product
Throws:
NotFoundException - if the class, related product or price adjustment isn't found

findByKey

PriceAdjustment findByKey(int adjustmentKey)
                          throws NotFoundException
Finds a price adjustment given its key.

Parameters:
adjustmentKey - key of price adjustment
Returns:
found adjustment
Throws:
NotFoundException - if price adjustment for key doesn't exist

findByProduct

PriceAdjustment findByProduct(Product adjustedProduct)
                              throws NotFoundException
Finds a price adjustment given its product.

Parameters:
adjustedProduct - product being adjusted
Returns:
found adjustment
Throws:
NotFoundException - if price adjustment for product
